definition: hyperthyroidism/abbr. for 甲狀腺功能亢進|甲状腺功能亢进[jia3 zhuang4 xian4 gong1 neng2 kang4 jin4]

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
surname Kang/Kang, one of the 28 constellations

sentences.english: It may be one of the characteristics of metabolism of plasma amino acids in hyperthyroidism.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是甲亢患者氨基酸代谢的特征之一。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the protective effects of Captopril on hyperthyroid rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究卡托普利对甲亢大鼠心肌的保护作用。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the misdiagnosis causes of hyperthyroid heart disease in elderly.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨老年甲亢性心脏病的误诊原因。

sentences.english: She had no personal or family history of hypertension or hyperthyroidism.
sentences.chinese: 她没有高血压和甲亢的个人或家庭病史。

sentences.english: Conclusion Hyperthyroidism presenting as bradycardia is related to the sinoatrial node function.
sentences.chinese: 结论甲亢可影响窦房结功能使其心动过缓。

sentences.english: Results There was no misembolization and mortality. Hyperthyroidism crisis developed in 2 cases.
sentences.chinese: 结果全组病例无异位栓塞和死亡，2例发生甲亢危象。

sentences.english: It can also present as either phase of thyrotoxicosis or hypothyroidism.
sentences.chinese: 也可以表现为甲亢或甲减单相变化。

sentences.english: The cornerstone of the treatment of THD is antithyroid therapy.
sentences.chinese: 甲亢心的主要治疗是抗甲状腺治疗。

sentences.english: Methods 12 cases of patients with hyperthyroidism merger periodic paralysis of the clinical data.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析12例甲亢合并周期性麻痹患者的临床资料。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate an effective therapy for the treatment of adolescent hyperthyroidism.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨青少年甲亢的治疗方法。

pinyin: jia3 zhuang4 xian4 gong1 neng2 kang4 jin4
